resources.string: Bluetooth Low Energy not supported in this mobile

1. Put your hands around Zteero.

2. Be sure your palms are in contact with the electrodes as you can see on the image, but not in contact between them. 

3. Press CONNECT to establish communication with Zteero.

4. When Zteero is connected with the app you can start the measure!

We are a company that has developed a product able of analyzing the nutritional state of a person which is called Zteero.

Zteero is only though for fitness purpouse. You can find more information about the product at\: www.Zteero.com or you can contact by sending an email at ZteeroCompany@gmail.com

This idea came to observe the bad eating habits of the population, and how these habits affect their nutritional status.

1. Put Zteero between one of your hands and one of your legs as you can see on the image.

2. Be sure that your hand is not in contact with your leg. In case of contact results will be wrong!

3. Press the button CONNECT to establish connection with Zteero Device.

4. When Zteero is connected with the app you can start the measurement.

Before the measure, the user must be under these conditions:


	- Have not eaten 2 hours before.

 	- Have urinated before the measure.

 	- Update weight before each evaluation.

 	- Correct positioning of the electrodes.

 	- Hands should not be in contact during the measure.

 	- Do not use Zteero when carrying metal elements (i.e. pacemaker, prosthesis)

Zteero is a personal monitoring handy device that allows one to measure in real time: 

- Heart and breathing rate

- Percentage of Fat Free Mass 

- Fat Mass

- Total Body Water

It is largely used by performers of various types of physical exercise.

This app records all your measures that can be find at history menu option for later study and to follow the evolution of your body.
